bibl.title: Do-List for Havana, by [Philip Showalter Hench], [1948]

div1.p: This is a list of the people and places that [Hench] wants to see while he is in Havana.

div1.head: Do-List for Havana, by [Philip Showalter Hench], [1948]

list.head:
THINGS I WANT TO DO IN HAVANA - AS MANY AS POSSIBLE
(Not necessarily listed in order of importance. * - of special importance)
list.item: * 1. Mr. Moran. - Discuss his manuscript and many other things.
* 2. Miss Agramonte - look over recent papers she found, etc., show her data.
* 3. Dr. Andreu - Discuss plans for Camp Lazear.
* 4. Dr. Nogueira - " " " " "
5. Dr. Felipe C. Ponce - " " " "
* 6. Mr. Macia - " " " " "
7. Others? (Ramos, The President, Recio) Discuss Plans for Camp Lazear.
* 8. Rojas family - Have them check my notes on last visit; show them material.
9. Albertini - Meet his widow or other relatives.
10. Dr. Eduardo Angeles -

*11. Ciudad Militar (Camp Columbia) Try to locate old U. S. Army Cemetery where
Lazear and others buried, temporarily (It was down the La Playa road).
Try to get airplane view showing strip from La Playa to Camp Lazear,
including site of false camp.

*12. Camp Lazear. Inspect Bldg. 1. Get photo of entrance San Jose Farm from roof
or upper floor building across the street.
13. Mr. Zunzunegui - ask a few questions.

*14. Finlay Family - Try to locate Finlay's speech of Dec. 22, 1900; banquet at
Delmonico's; also letters, papers, etc. of Finlay; locate and photo-
graph Finlay's old home at 156 (old 52) Prado. Try to find photos of
their old home of 1900.

*15. Finlay Institute. Do they have American translations of all of Finlay's
papers? Photo Finlay's original paper of 1881. Data on Delgado.

16. Finlay Park. Find out what year statues erected; where can I find dedica-
tion speeches by Agramonte and others (newspapers of the date?)?
*17. Guiteras family. Meet survivors. Didget Guiteras speech at the Delmonico banquet?

*18. Belin College. Visit the Jesuits; find old-timer who might find records
regarding early rental of San Jose Farm.
*19. Quemados and Marianao. Try to find old photos, maps and books.

20. Las Animas Hospital. Photo signs in room where Miss Maass supposed to have
died. Try to locate record (original) of her fatal illness.

*21. Military Hospital #1. (Calixto Garcia Hosp.) Try to locate lab where Agra-
monte worked (on old maps). Does it still exist?

22. Mrs. R. Hart Phillips. Help in finding old photos, newspapers, etc. Discuss
publication of article on Camp Lazear. Where was old Delmonico resturant?

*23. Pinar del Rio - Visit town if possible. Try to find old cuartel and guard
house.

*24. Ramos - Where was the Third Pan American Congress held in Havana, February
1901 (Where Reed read the second paper)?

25. Havana - Miscellaneous.
(a) Visit General Library - old newspapers.
(b) Who was Madame Abreu whose monkey Agramonte borrowed for early
experiments?
* (c) Medical library. Locate and photo Finlay's 1881 paper.
* (d) Museum - Where Finlay mementoes on view (Microscope, manuscripts, etc.).
* (e) Pan American Airways - any airplane photos showing strip of land
between La Playa, Camp Columbia and Camp Lazear?
(f) Locate Delmonicos; also place where 3rd Pan American Congress held,
February 1901.
* (g) Gen. Wood's old headquarters (Plaza des Armas).
Visit Wood's old office - 2nd floor; take photos.
* (h) Old book stores - try to locate Finlay's original paper; Proc. III
Congress, Old maps and photos Havana 1900, etc.
(i) Spanish Consulate. Find out who was consul in 1900. Gen Truby p 153
(j) Visit mural of Raquel Romero.
K Posts 110 Agramonte St.
